item.title: Glowhollow
item.description: Glowhollow The undercity of the Trinity Kingdom.

item.title: Operation Hyena
item.description: Operation Hyena An operation carried out by the Arbiters of the Prismatic Guard guard to crush the smuggling groups of the Glowhollow in an effort to reduce illegal activity.

item.title: Deacon
item.description: Deacon Former Shardwalker of the Aetheric Conclave.

item.title: Ascendants
item.description: Ascendants The faction of the Aetheric Conclave hoping to radicalize the nation into a technological Gem-focused revolution to catch-up to the Deepcrystal Enclave and Trinity Kingdom in advancement.

item.title: Aetheric Conclave
item.description: Aetheric Conclave A location once seen as a religious epicenter since Commonization but gained popularity and power during the Renaissance.

item.title: Hellions
item.description: Hellions A singular, elite squad of the Prismatic Guard. They pride themselves on their combat ability and grit.

item.title: Kai
item.description: Kai A captain of the Prismatic Guard with poor Resilience in all Gem types but makes up for it through extreme dexterity and acumen.

item.title: Jane
item.description: Jane Infamous Orchestrator of the Glowhollow. Nothing is known about her and no one has ever seen her.

item.title: Exaltists
item.description: Exaltists The faction of the Aetheric Conclave that believes in the sanctity of Gems. They are the ruling faction of the nation.

item.title: 2025-11-09 Session 1 - Into the Deep End
item.description: Next >> 2025-11-09 Session 1 - Into the Deep End Our characters Ben, Deacon, Neptune, Serra, Soren, and Thalen all meet at an inner city bar.
